list_definition.definition: a sum of money which is given to a court of law to get an untried prisoner out of prison until the time of his/her trial, and which acts as security for his/her return

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The judge set the bail at $500

list_definition.mean_english: 1 trong 2 thanh ngang nằm trên bộ cọc gôn
list_definition.definition: one of the cross-pieces laid on the top of the wicket in cricket

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The wicket keeper knocked off the bails.
